channel.title: Need a few beta testers
channel.description:
I need a couple of beta testers for Punk Rock PK 2. Im online it now, You have to download the V1.0 client to play.
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=SP1QX7HA
I posted it on mopars server status but of course it takes up to 24 hours for them to approve SO im posting here for a little help hopefully.
If you want to help me test it out download the client and the IP is punkrockpk.no-ip.biz
The client isnt a closed source. Just type your user, hit enter, type your pass, hit enter, type the url, click login.
Im looking to assign two mod spots tonight so help me out ^^

item.title: Need a few beta testers
item.dc:creator: @LeechYourStuffPlease LeechYourStuffPlease
item.description:
@LeechYourStuffPlease wrote:

I guess I’ll beta test…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 16, 2008, 11:05:18 pm[/size][hr]They IP your client connects to is 127.0.0.1 IDIOT

Read full topic
